# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that acts as the template’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any CPTabBarTemplateDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must conform to the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTabBarTemplateDelegate] protocol.

## Managing Tab Bar Interactions

- **CPTabBarTemplateDelegate**: The methods an object implements to act as the delegate for a tab bar template.
